verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and all his army, <S%H2428><s%> and all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> that were under his dominion, <S%H3027><s%> and all the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> were fighting <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of it, <S%H559><s%> saying:

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Go, <S%H1980><s%> and speak <S%H559><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> Thus says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H5414><s%> I will give this city <S%H5892><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire: <S%H784><s%>

and you shall not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of his hand, <S%H3027><s%> but shall surely <S%H8610><s%> be taken, <S%H8610><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> with you mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and you shall go <S%H935><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

Yet hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> O Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> concerning you, <S%H4191><s%> You shall not die by the sword; <S%H2719><s%>

you shall die <S%H4191><s%> in peace; <S%H7965><s%> and with the burnings <S%H4955><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> who were before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H8313><s%> so shall they make a burning for you; <S%H5594><s%> and they shall lament you, <S%H1945><s%> saying, Ah Lord! <S%H113><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>

when the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s army <S%H2428><s%> was fighting <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that were left, <S%H3498><s%> against Lachish <S%H3923><s%> and against Azekah; <S%H5825><s%> for these alone remained <S%H7604><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> as fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

The word <S%H1697><s%> that came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with all the people <S%H5971><s%> who were at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty to them; <S%H1865><s%>

that every man <S%H376><s%> should let his male <S%H5650><s%> servant, <S%H376><s%> and every man his female <S%H8198><s%> servant, <S%H5680><s%> who is a Hebrew or a Hebrewess, <S%H5680><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> free; <S%H2670><s%> that none should make bondservants <S%H5647><s%> of them, <S%H3064><s%> of a Jew his brother. <S%H251><s%>

All the princes <S%H8269><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> obeyed, <S%H935><s%> who had entered into the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> that everyone <S%H376><s%> should let his male <S%H5650><s%> servant, <S%H376><s%> and everyone his female <S%H8198><s%> servant, <S%H7971><s%> go free, <S%H2670><s%> that none should make bondservants <S%H5647><s%> of them any more; <S%H8085><s%> they obeyed, and let them go: <S%H7971><s%>

but afterwards <S%H310><s%> they turned, <S%H7725><s%> and caused the servants <S%H5650><s%> and the handmaids, <S%H8198><s%> whom they had let go <S%H7971><s%> free, <S%H2670><s%> to return, <S%H7725><s%> and brought them into subjection <S%H3533><s%> for servants <S%H5650><s%> and for handmaids. <S%H8198><s%>
Therefore the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage, <S%H5650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

At the end <S%H7093><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall let go <S%H7971><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> who is a Hebrew, <S%H5680><s%> who has been sold <S%H4376><s%> to you, <S%H5647><s%> and has served you six <S%H8337><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> you shall let him go <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> from you: <S%H1><s%> but your fathers didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to me, <S%H5186><s%> neither inclined their ear. <S%H241><s%>

You had now <S%H3117><s%> turned, <S%H7725><s%> and had done <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> in proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> and you had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the house <S%H1004><s%> which is called <S%H7121><s%> by my name: <S%H8034><s%>

but you turned <S%H7725><s%> and profaned <S%H2490><s%> my name, <S%H8034><s%> and caused every man <S%H376><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> whom you had let <S%H7971><s%> go free <S%H2670><s%> at their pleasure, <S%H5315><s%> to return; <S%H7725><s%> and you brought them into subjection, <S%H3533><s%> to be to you for servants <S%H5650><s%> and for handmaids. <S%H8198><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> you have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to me, <S%H7121><s%> to proclaim liberty, <S%H1865><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor: <S%H7453><s%> behold, <S%H7121><s%> I proclaim to you a liberty, <S%H1865><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to the sword, <S%H2719><s%> to the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and to the famine; <S%H7458><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> you to be tossed <S%H2189><s%> back and forth among all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will give <S%H5414><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> who have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> who have not performed <S%H6965><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which they made <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H3772><s%> when they cut the calf <S%H5695><s%> in two <S%H8147><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> between its parts; <S%H1335><s%>

the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the eunuchs, <S%H5631><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> who passed <S%H5674><s%> between the parts <S%H1335><s%> of the calf; <S%H5695><s%>

I will even give <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> their life; <S%H5315><s%> and their dead bodies <S%H5038><s%> shall be for food <S%H3978><s%> to the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and to the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> their life, <S%H5315><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s army, <S%H2428><s%> who have gone away from you. <S%H5927><s%>

Behold, <S%H6680><s%> I will command, says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and cause them to return <S%H7725><s%> to this city; <S%H5892><s%> and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against it, <S%H3920><s%> and take it, <S%H8313><s%> and burn it with fire: <S%H784><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> without inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>
